thread.title: Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar
thread.title_full: Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar

author: wtopstaff
title: Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar
text:
Home » News » Entertainment » Music » Top 20 Global Concert… Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar By The Associated Press October 16, 2015 10:54 am 
The Top 20 Global Concert Tours ranks artists by average box office gross per city and includes the average ticket price for shows worldwide. The list is based on data provided to the trade publication Pollstar by concert promoters and venue managers. 
TOP 20 GLOBAL CONCERT TOURS 
1. Taylor Swift; $5,050,654; $111.58. 
2. Kenny Chesney; $2,850,812; $89.75. 
3. Luke Bryan; $1,679,159; $52.20. 
4. Ed Sheeran; $1,642,435; $62.21. 
5. Violetta; $1,328,823; $63.28. 
6. Foo Fighters; $1,216,281; $59.40. 
7. Dave Matthews Band; $1,195,762; $57.44. 
8. Rush; $1,144,401; $90.64. 
10. Shania Twain; $1,030,921; $93.16. 
11. Nicki Minaj; $653,854; $45.00. 
12. Motley Crue; $651,906; $72.12. 
13. Chris Brown; $594,281; $40.33. 
14. Florida Georgia Line; $593,729; $34.86. 
15. Def Leppard; $576,819; $45.70. 
16. Chayanne; $569,559; $88.34. 
17. Marco Antonio Solis; $569,451; $109.68. 
18. J. Cole; $567,289; $34.63. 
19. Imagine Dragons; $533,859; $58.36. 
20. Jason Aldean; $510,433; $39.02. Topics:
